name: leo
content:

a large constellation (= a group of stars) said to look like a lion: Mercury lies close to the bright star Regulus in Leo.
[ C or U ] the fifth sign of the zodiac, relating to the period 23 July to 22 August, represented by a lion, or a person born during this period: They were both born under the sign of Leo. My youngest son is a Leo.
More examplesFewer examplesIn those ancient times, the first crescent Moon of summer was seen among the stars of Leo the Lion.We often see a smattering of shooting stars in the constellation Leo.Leos can be rather dramatic at times.He's fearless, a typical Leo.
